abstract: An analyst who has been critical of Citigroup met on Friday with the bank’s chief executive, Vikram S. Pandit, and its shares surged.
snippet: An analyst who has been critical of Citigroup met on Friday with the bank’s chief executive, Vikram S. Pandit, and its shares surged.
lead_paragraph: Michael Mayo, the analyst who has been a vocal critic of Citigroup, had his big meeting with the bank’s chief executive, Vikram S. Pandit, on Friday. But his arguments may not have carried the day, according to several attendees.
